events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-30 involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision and damages reported.
An experienced claims agent, specialized in auto accidents, was assigned to oversee the investigation and settlement process.
The insurer sent an official acknowledgment of the claim filing to the customer including the next steps for documentation.
Requested copies of the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and the insured's driver license for claim validation.
The insured promptly submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and proof of insurance.
The investigation team began reviewing the gathered documents and contacted witnesses to verify the accident details.
Investigation concluded confirming the insured's fault was partial, and the damage assessment was consistent with the report.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and partial liability coverage was communicated to the insured for review.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and clarity of the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved based on all documentation and investigation results confirming coverage eligibility.
The approved payment amount was transferred to the insuredâ€™s account to cover the cost of repairs and deductible.
The claim case was formally closed after confirmation of payment receipt and repair completion without further issues.
